bio: Sarah Gordon is a trained journalist and copywriter. As the founder of agency SGContent, she works with brands around the world to help them tell their story and connect with today’s consumers. She takes journalism principles from her career writing for the Times, Telegraph and MailOnline and combines them with SEO to help businesses build a strong online presence through content marketing. Sarah believes every business has a story to tell, it is her job to help them uncover it and share it with the right target audience.
title: Qualified journalist and copywriter. Helping brands connect with today’s consumers and stand out online.
